fields.name: IPAs
fields.description: Hoppy and aromatic India Pale Ales with a variety of flavors ranging from citrus to pine.

fields.name: Lagers
fields.description: Crisp and refreshing lagers, perfect for any occasion.

fields.name: Stouts & Porters
fields.description: Rich and creamy dark beers with notes of chocolate, coffee, and roasted malt.

fields.name: Wheat Beers
fields.description: Light and smooth wheat beers with a hint of citrus and spice.

fields.name: Pale Ales
fields.description: Balanced pale ales with a mix of malt sweetness and hop bitterness.

fields.name: Sours
fields.description: Tart and tangy sour beers, often with fruity or funky flavors.

fields.name: Seasonal Brews
fields.description: Special brews available only during certain times of the year.

fields.name: Light Beers
fields.description: Low-alcohol, easy-drinking beers for casual enjoyment.

fields.name: Merchandise
fields.description: A range of branded merchandise including apparel, accessories, and more.

fields.name: Gift Sets
fields.description: Specially curated gift sets featuring our craft beers and other goodies.
